Build Your Dream House
Located in the Cloverton Estate this 448m2, Approximately, land is an opportunity not to miss. Easy access to Hume Freeway, Donnybrook Rd and Donnybrook station makes commute to work easy.
Cloverton is set to become Victoria's largest master planned community.
Located 38kms approx from Melbourne's CBD, it will become a city of the future for Melbourne's North, with homes to suit every family and budget.

Description:
A New Style Of Living in Cloverton Estate
If you need plenty of space for the family, this fantastic newly built home of approx 25sq is certainly one to take into consideration. With its instant street appeal & a perfect floor plan that will accommodate all your families needs, this amazing Glenvill home will excite your senses.
Designed to complement family living whilst providing maximum flexibility, this home features 4 good sized bedrooms, ensuite boasts double vanities & walk in robes. A centrally located kitchen has a large pantry & mirrored splashback that looks out to the spacious open plan living area, plus the added bonus of a separate living room, giving you the peace of mind that you will certainly have plenty of room to grow.
Loaded with quality extras including a double remote garage with internal access, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher & stone bench tops, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, LED down lights to entry & living areas, letterbox, clothesline, professionally landscaped gardens all around including & all on a great family sized allotment of 392m2.
Simply move in knowing everything has been done for you. Don't miss out on this sensational offering, call today!

Description:
Brand New Family Home In Prime Location
* Take advantage of Stamp Duty Savings
* Take advantage of First Home Owners Grant
* Deposit Terms: 5% or 10% of the purchase price
This stunning home provides 4 spacious bedrooms, master suite complemented by an oversized walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity and large shower, remaining bedrooms with built in robes, formal lounge, rumpus, walk in butler's pantry, powder room and central bathroom, a spacious natural light filled family living area with adjoining meals area & an ambient outdoor living area.
Added Features Includes:
- 31sqs Family Home on 512m2 land
- 2 Kitchens with kingsize walk in butlers pantry
- Stainless Steel appliances & Oversized laundry
- Fully tiled bathroom walls - both bathrooms
- Quality tiled floors
- Double glazed windows
- High ceilings & Downlights throughout
- Caesar Stone Benchtops throughout
- Landscaping & Colorbond fence
- Evaporative cooling & Ducted heating
- 3 toilets, theatre room and large alfresco
- Double Remote Garage with Internal Access
Set in a quiet street on a generous allotment and conveniently located in a family-friendly neighbourhood. Don't miss out on securing this golden opportunity! This one won't last.
* Less than 5 minutes to Train Station
* Public Transport Short Drive away
* Easy access onto the Freeway & Local Schools
* Minutes away from the Upcoming Business Center & all the amenities
Please contact Raj Kapoor on 0466 665 613 to arrange a private viewing

58 BUNTING CRESCENT, KALKALLO 3064

Build a contemporary architecturally designed home on this flat square big block with no easement. the perfect location where you can build the luxurious home you have always wanted. CLOVERTON a home to plenty of fantastic amenities: close to train station, shopping center, childcare, community centers and beautiful parks with the amazing playgrounds. Description:
A Brand New Beginning
Immaculate in presentation, built with style, comfort and luxury in mind, this light filled stunning home sure to suit all home buyers.
This fantastic low maintenance Brand new home is ideal for all, with its spacious floorplan, designer flair & unbeatable location, this beautiful home showcases an abundance of natural light that includes an open plan meals/living area with a brilliantly well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, featuring Oven, 5 Burner stove and stone benchtops.
On offer are 3 great sized bedrooms, featuring master with walk in robe & ensuite, plus a modern central bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles, and spacious study. This home boasts an abundance of extras including ducted heating, evaporative cooling, high ceilings throughout, remote controlled garage with internal access, alarm system and so much more. Be quick to inspect this will not hang around for long.

Description:
TURN KEY Brand NEW High Quality Home!
Ideal for first home buyers, downsizers and investors. With quality oozing inside and out, this house boasts stylish fittings and showcases three bedrooms with built in robes (master with ensuite and walk in robe), gleaming kitchen with walk in pantry, stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and glass splash back, spacious living and dining area and central bathroom featuring floor to ceiling tiles and bathtub. Quality extras including porcelain tiles throughout the home, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, double remote garage, intercom and concrete all around outside.
This Lavishly Stylish Home is what you have been looking for.
Right from the moment you set eyes inside the entrance, you know this is a stylish house waiting for a family to call it their home.
Located in the highly sort after area of Kalkallo .. nearby to local park, sporting grounds, shopping complex and future schools
With 3 generous size bedrooms, Master ensuite with his & hers vanity and walk in robe, 2 bedrooms with mirror sliding doors, shelving and draws inside the wardrobes.
A spectacular Kitchen with 40mm stone waterfall bench tops, glass mirror splash back, feature pendant lights, under benchtop sink and classy mixer tap. stainless steel 900mm free standing oven and range hood, stainless steel dishwasher,
An open plan kitchen, dining, living area ..which already has the built-in entertainment unit, with feature wall cut out, perfect for your flat screen wall mounted tv, Plus there's a study room with ready built desk, draws and overhead cupboards.
What more could you ask for .. !!!!
A spectacular must see home.. with so many more extras

Porter Davis home - Stamp Duty saver with luxury Design!!! $10,000 FHOG for eligible buyers!!
All you need is 5% deposit to secure the property and balance to be paid at Settlement.
18 Pascal Crescent, Kalkallo is built by reputed Builder Porter Davis in the sought after Cloverton Estate. Cloverton will become the centre of education north of Melbourne - with childcare, schools and tertiary facilities all proposed for the area. A major retail centre is being planned, while public transport and medical services will provide everything the community needs.
This Porter Davis home comes equipped with luxury turn-key inclusions such as professionally styled interior color themes, stone bench tops, carpets, tiles, high ceilings and much more. Front landscaping, driveway and quality flooring are also all part of the inclusion list.
Property offers:
- 4 Bedrooms - Master with en-suite & walk in robe and other 3 Bedrooms with built in robe serviced by central bathroom and separate Water Closet
- Modern open plan kitchen
- Walk in Pantry
- Open plan living area
- Rumpus Area
- 20mm Stone Benchtop
- 900mm Quality Stainless Steel Cooktop and range-hood
- High ceiling 2590mm
- Alfresco
- Remote controlled double garage & much more!!
You can purchase a brand new quality Porter Davis home and rest easy knowing all you have to do is move in when it's completed.
Please contact Hemant on 0447 064 664 or VK Bhanot on 0488 049 926.

Stunning 4 Bedroom Family Home!
This stunning family home is located in the Kallo estate. Comprising of 4 large bedrooms (ensuite to main) with open plan kitchen, meals and family, separate lounge/theatre and an alfresco entertaining area with low maintenance gardens.
With easy access to the Hume Freeway and close to the Donnybrook train station, this home is surrounded with endless parkland, and sporting ovals, the Kalkallo hotel & the upcoming major retail centre is being planned for the area, amongst them childcare, schools and tertiary facilities.
This home will provide everything you need at your fingertip.
Featuring:
- 4 bedrooms with BIR's - (ensuite to main)
- Alfresco entertaining area
- Double garage (remote and internal access)
- Front and rear landscaping
- Spacious walk in pantry

- Down lights throughout
This is an opportunity not to be missed so act now and inspect now
